content.body: @shuyuguo:matrix.org @bakkot:matrix.org thoughts on making Call's argument list parameter mandatory? https://github.com/tc39/proposal-upsert/pull/65
content.formatted_body: @shu @bakkot thoughts on making Call's argument list parameter mandatory? https://github.com/tc39/proposal-upsert/pull/65

content.body: even though we do omit the arguments list a decent amount in 262, I think it's a bit of a footgun
and an explicit empty list makes it a little harder for a reader to make the analogous mistake
I am OK with it as long as you're volunteering to find and update every downstream spec again
I think we should audit the AOs that have optional arguments at the moment and do all the ones we want to do in one go
I don't want to do this for Call and then next month do it again for another one
